title.title: Reminder - the congestion charge will cost £8 from Monday 4th July

texts: Transport for London (TfL) is reminding all drivers that the congestion charge will cost £8 per day from Monday 4th July.
Drivers can also make a discounted monthly or annual payment.
Monthly and annual payments will receive a 15 per cent discount equating to 3 and 40 charge-free days respectively.
Business fleet users will be able to pay a discounted daily charge of £7 per day for the use of the automated fleet scheme for fleets with ten or more vehicles.
The Mayor has stated that the congestion charge will not be raised again during the current Mayoral term.
